long_description: The APF personal flotation device from MTI provides exceptional value for the casual paddler. Universal sizing adjusts from a 30 in. chest circumference to 56 in.; works as a spare vest. Durable and lightweight nylon shell with closed-cell foam flotation delivers long-lasting service and high performance. Adjustable side straps offer a wide fit range; wide arm holes add comfort and free arm movement. Shoulder adjustments are covered to add protection and provide a smooth, finished look to the vest. Hang loop at back neck allows easy storage and drying. Reflective tape increases visibility in low light.
short_description: The APF personal flotation device from MTI provides exceptional value for the casual paddler.
